message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
Alice, I understand you want a larger share, but that offer isn't fair to me. I propose a 55/45 split.  It benefits us both to settle this round before inflation eats away at the value.
Bob, inflation is hurting us both. Let's settle this now. I'm willing to accept the 55/45 split, but in my favor this time.
